title: INSURABILITY) (AMENDMENT) (NO. 3) (JOBSEEKER’S PAYRELATED BENEFIT) REGULATIONS 2024
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Contributions and Insurability) (Amendment) (No. 3) (Jobseeker’s Pay-Related 
Benefit) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations and the Social Welfare (Consolidated Contributions 
and Insurability Regulations) 1996 to 2024 shall be construed together as one 
and may be cited together as the Social Welfare (Consolidated Contributions and 
Insurability) Regulations 1996 to 2024. 

Commencement

title: INSURABILITY) (AMENDMENT) (NO. 3) (JOBSEEKER’S PAYRELATED BENEFIT) REGULATIONS 2024
heading: 3. The Social Welfare (Consolidated Contributions and Insurability)
text_raw:
3. The Social Welfare (Consolidated Contributions and Insurability) 

Regulations 1996 (S.I. No. 312 of 1996) are amended – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

and 

(d) 

in sub-article (2) of article 49 by the insertion of “, jobseeker’s 
pay-related benefit,” after jobseeker’s benefit (self-employed),” 

in sub-article (5) of article 58 by the insertion of “, or jobseeker’s 
pay-related benefit,” after “jobseeker’s benefit (self-employed),” 

in sub-article (3) of article 63 is amended by the insertion of 
“jobseeker’s pay-related benefit,” after “jobseeker’s benefit,” 

in sub-article (2)(b) of article 86 by the insertion of “or 
jobseeker’s pay-related benefit” after “jobseeker’s benefit”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th December, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Finance consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[677] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

2 December, 2024.

title: INSURABILITY) (AMENDMENT) (NO. 3) (JOBSEEKER’S PAYRELATED BENEFIT) REGULATIONS 2024
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 amended the Social 
Welfare Consolidation Act 2005 to provide for a new social insurance scheme 
entitled Jobseeker’s Pay-Related Benefit which provides that the amount of 
benefit a person may get when they become unemployed will be directly linked 
to their previous earnings. The scheme will commence from 31st March 2025. 
These Regulations, which come into effect from 31st March 2025, amend the 
Social Welfare (Consolidated Contributions and Insurability) Regulations 1996 
(S.I. No. 312 of 1996) consequential to the introduction of Jobseeker’s PayRelated Benefit.
